nhc_headline: ...EYE OF BERYL PASSING SOUTH OF THE DOMINICAN REPUBLIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY...
summary:
...EYE OF BERYL PASSING SOUTH OF THE DOMINICAN REPUBLIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY...
 As of 2:00 PM AST Tue Jul 2
 the center of Beryl was located near 15.6, -69.9
 with movement WNW at 22 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 943 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 155 mph.
